sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Default NLU Model Category to virtual_agent as all existing models are of Virtual agent category.</description>
        <name>Default NLU Model Category</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateNLUModelCategory(category) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_nlu_model");
    gr.addNullQuery("category");
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue("category",category);
        gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.autoSysFields(false);
        gr.update();
    }
}

updateNLUModelCategory("virtual_agent");]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-08-21 05:58:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>041d24c1773210102f5a3882a91061d7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Default NLU Model Category</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Core" source="com.glide.nlu">302438683c31311068bcf327dfe37f2f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_041d24c1773210102f5a3882a91061d7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-08-23 13:03:59</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
